trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Irving
There were no other sightings in Irving on or around November 4th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at work outside talking to my wife on the phone at 11:39pm Central, I looked up at the sky toward the west a couple of minutes later (there are multiple airports in this area) and this boomarang shaped dark gray aircraft (about the size of 3, or 4 747's combined about 4 or 500 feet above the ground streaked across the sky very silent and extremely fast.
Summary: I thought it was smoke when I looked up it streaked across the sky - silent and very fast.
